content.html: Flew in for a friend’s bachelor party and the moment I check into my hotel, someone in group chat says: “Just found out someone I spent the past 4 days with has Covid but don’t worry I tested negative and I’ll wear a mask.” No, I think I won’t worry because you’re staying home.
content.value:
Flew in for a friend’s bachelor party and the moment I check into my hotel, someone in group chat says:

“Just found out someone I spent the past 4 days with has Covid but don’t worry I tested negative and I’ll wear a mask.”

No, I think I won’t worry because you’re staying home.
